name: privileges
title: Privileges
description: Grant and revoke admin permission with SAP Privileges (https://github.com/SAP/macOS-enterprise-privileges). Not affiliated with SAP.
author: ph00lt0

commands.name: grant
commands.title: Grant Admin Privileges
commands.description: Grant admin permission with SAP Privileges

commands.name: revoke
commands.title: Revoke Admin Privileges
commands.description: Revoke admin permission with SAP Privileges

commands.name: temp
commands.title: Grant Admin Privileges For 1 Minute
commands.description: Grant admin permission with SAP Privileges for 1 minute
